Data analysis

Stata

  • Stata Cheatsheets [Tim Essam and Laura Hughes]
  • StataList: Discussions about Stata, statistics, and Stata and statistics
  • UCLA Stata Resources: Resources to help you learn and use Stata
  • Stata Graphs: Visual overview for creating graphs

R

  • RStudio: Various resources, packages, and help from RStudio
  • swirl: A package to learn R within R.
